content.rendered:
Directed by Christian Tafdrup

Written by Christian Tafdrup. Mads Tafdrup

Star Morten Burian(Bjørn). Sidsel Siem Koch(Louise). Fedja van Huêt(Patrick). Karina Smulders(Karin). Liva Forsberg(Agnes). Marius Damslev(Abel). Hichem Yacoubi(Muhajid). Jesper Dupont(Jonas). Lea Baastrup Rønne(Fie). Adrian Blanchard(Derek). Sarina Maria Rausa(Hannah). Ilaria Di Raimo(Babysitter). Alessio Barni(Opera singer). Ilaria Casai(Opera singer). Martina Barreca(Opera singer). Andrea Benucci(Lut player). Sieger Sloot(Waiter)

Language English. Dutch. Danish

Producers Johnny Andersen. Simone Bachini. Jacob Jarek. Simone Lund-Jensen. Ditte Milsted. Trent

Production Profile Pictures. OAK Motion Pictures. Danish Film Institute
